snippet: Despite starting a half-hour later, Jimmy Kimmel managed a ratings victory over his bitter rival, Jay Leno on Thursday. He was helped by NBC's especially poor lead-in for Mr. Leno.
abstract: Despite starting a half-hour later, Jimmy Kimmel managed a ratings victory over his bitter rival, Jay Leno on Thursday. He was helped by NBC's especially poor lead-in for Mr. Leno.

headline.main: For a Day, Kimmel Beats Leno in Ratings
